# ADMX-23 Tovek Hybrid EMP Missile System
A hybrid EMP [color=GreenYellow]missile[/color] pod that fires EMPHE shells meant to disable enemy ships and weaken their armor.
## Pod Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson] 12 RPM [/color]/[color=deepskyblue] 0.2 RPS [/color] - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]3000 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=orange]40000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]1312u/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]12500u[/color]
## Missile Specifications
- Acceleration: [color=mediumspringgreen][bold]80 m/s²[/bold][/color] - Tracking Range: [color=orangered][bold]300m[/bold][/color] - Scanning Arc: [color=teal]50 degrees[/color] - Launch Speed: [color=darkorange]100 m/s[/color] - Max Speed: [color=darkorange]300 m/s[/color] - Range: [color=orange]1260m[/color]
